nodes.bodyText: Why is this necessary? It gets overridden a few lines later anyways or not?
Good catch, I accidentally left it in, I'll remove it with the next commit

I was wondering whether this should be /exams/ instead of /exam/. Whenever a student navigates to an exercise, they are routed to (e.g.) /courses/1/exercises/1. Changing /exam/ to /exams/ would help keep it consistent with the overview (/courses/:courseId/exams) as well.
Yes, good point, I changed it now to exams
